title: Anyone need help learning about League?

embed.description: League of Legends Tutor. 1 like. I am a Platinum V League of Legends player who is excited to teach league players. I charge $5 for two hours and am open...

body:
Hey guys, anyone interested in LOL tuition click on the link for info 

Thanks you

replies.body:
You shouldn't be teaching anyone, what makes you think that a Plat V player (which is basically low elo) should teach others? You aren't anywhere near good, you're barely average, don't get mad because your stats prove this, you have absolutely nothing to offer anyone if anything you would probably be telling people the wrong thing.

Plat players are terrible, i would know i just got out of Plat on this account.

A High diamond person could be a teacher but not have the real life skills to actually teach someone. Obviously you know your stuff being diamond V , but why assume that I cant get to  diamond. 

It only takes time
Ty :)

Plat players are terrible, i'm including you in this, to be even remotely able to teach someone you would need to be at least Diamond 3, anything below that is utter shit, if i played with you i bet i could find a million things you're doing wrong.

I didn't assume you cant get to Diamond, but judging by your win/loss you will not get Diamond any time soon, you're struggling to keep a 50% winrate, 88/84 51% winrate, you almost have more deaths than kills in your KDA, i mean come on do you really think you're going to get anywhere with these stats? And your last ranked game was 23 days ago, you barely play and you think you're gonna climb let alone teach people how to play? (which includes teaching them how to climb)

Btw you'll decay in five days if you don't play.
hahaha more deaths than kills in my KDA, please stop lying.  I know im a good ADC and can teach people.

> you **almost** have more deaths than kills in your KDA

Not a lie, have you even looked at your stats? You are not a good ADC, you're barely average.

I wonder what your life is like? 

Pretty sad now that I'v mentioned it

What's a good rate to charge for teaching people the game?

How about nothing?

Fact is there are Youtube videos, streams and everything of the like, that can probably teach a lot more then you, and most of these are free.

Game knowledge doesn't get you ranks, Game mechanics/time get you ranks.

True but don't you feel like you learn more from someone else, also 5 dollars for 2 hours is reasonable.
Ty :)
Girl, you ain't even in the top 15% chill the hell out and get D1 then you can teach people.

I'm in the top 10%, my aim is to teach the basics. Not rotations / high level strategies. 
Ty :)
